automata

Interface Automaton

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Recognizer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutomatonBuilder, DeterministicAutomaton
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAutomaton, NDAutomaton

extends Recognizer
